mapper.select: SELECT si_name as schoolname, count(IF(st_grade='一等奖',st_grade,NULL)) as first, count(IF(st_grade='二等奖',st_grade,NULL)) as second, count(IF(st_grade='特等奖',st_grade,NULL)) as special, count(IF(st_grade='一等奖',st_grade,NULL))+ count(IF(st_grade='二等奖',st_grade,NULL))+count(IF(st_grade='特等奖',st_grade,NULL)) as total FROM scienceresultnation where sign = 0 GROUP BY si_name order by MAX(si_name) ASC

SELECT si_name as schoolname, count(IF(st_grade='一等奖',st_grade,NULL)) as first, count(IF(st_grade='二等奖',st_grade,NULL)) as second, count(IF(st_grade='特等奖',st_grade,NULL)) as special, count(IF(st_grade='一等奖',st_grade,NULL))+ count(IF(st_grade='二等奖',st_grade,NULL))+count(IF(st_grade='特等奖',st_grade,NULL)) as total FROM scienceresultnation where st_time BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime} AND sign = 0 GROUP BY si_name order by MAX(si_name) ASC

SELECT schoolname, GROUP_CONCAT(time ORDER BY time ASC) as Date, GROUP_CONCAT(first ORDER BY time ASC) as First, GROUP_CONCAT(second ORDER BY time ASC)as Second, GROUP_CONCAT(special ORDER BY time ASC)as Special, SUM(First+Second+Special) as total FROM count_st_nation WHERE time BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime} GROUP BY schoolname order by MAX(schoolname) ASC
